articles.author: Julian E. Barnes, Jeffrey Gettleman
articles.title: U.S. Warns of Potential Attacks by Russia on Civilian Targets - The New York Times
articles.description: American intelligence agencies warned of a heightened threat in the coming days on Ukraine’s civilian infrastructure and government buildings. Russia claimed a Ukrainian woman carried out the bombing that killed Daria Dugina.
articles.content:
An apartment building damaged in a Russian strike last week in Nikopol, Ukraine.Credit...David Guttenfelder for The New York Times
